comments.content: It could be a manually expanded **[Orator (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114631/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Orator%20Std%20-%20Medium&fid=9655147db8fc635a55794b94562c9d82&fsize=36&text=ACTUALIDAD%20Y%20TENDENCIAS%20EN%20TECNOLOGIA&wrap=2)** by John Scheppler (1962) - available from Adobe, Linotype, Bitstream & Tilde
